Reference

All functions

add_age_of_death_column()

Add age of death column to a CenSoc data table

add_educ_recode_column()

Add column with recoded education to a CenSoc data table

clean_key()

Clean matching keys

colVars()

Calculate variance of columns

create_censoc()

Create a dataset of matched census and socsec data

create_national_censoc()

Create a national dataset of matched census and socsec data based on state matched files

get_death_proportions_post_samples()

Get posterior samples of death distribution from Bayesian truncated Gompertz model

get_estimated_deaths()

Get estimated deaths from Bayesian truncated Gompertz model

get_first_word()

Get first word from a string

get_hmd_death_distribution()

HMD death distributions

get_hmd_death_pcs()

Principal components from HMD

get_jags_data()

Get left and right truncation ages for each cohort and grouping variable level

get_meta_data()

Get meta data associated with tabulated deaths by cohort, age of death and grouping variable

get_truncation_ages()

Get left and right truncation ages for each cohort and grouping variable level

load_census()

Load a census file

load_socsec_deaths()

Load a census file

read_hmd()

Read in HMD text file

tabulate_deaths()

Calculate number of deaths by birth year, age of death and possible grouping variables

truncated_gompertz_model()

Run MCMC for Bayesian truncated Gompertz model

waic()

Calculate WAIC from log-likelihood
